member_organisations: Charity with no members but a Board of Directors of circa 8 people and a wide network of Volunteers
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Education and training, Environment, Youth, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy
eu_initiatives: Working on common fisheries policy and sustainable fisheries in the North Western Waters Advisory Council. Also member of the Irish North East and the West FLAG.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
North Western Waters Advisory Council 
Irish Marine Institute Seal Depredation Group 
Irish Environmental Network
goals__remit:
The Irish Seal Sanctuary is a professionally run wildlife hospital, rescue and rehabilitation facility. We are a registered charity and are sustained entirely by voluntary effort and donations from the public. 
We strive for sustainability in the use of marine resources for all users.
relevant_communication:
Inclusive education - environmental education at schools on marine biodiversity (http://irishsealsanctuary.org/education/).  
Irish Naturalists journal publications (hooded seals and green seals).   
Facebook – Irish Seal Sanctuary 
https://www.facebook.com/Irish-Seal-Sanctuary-196564313813250/
